direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve order-related data but differ in the status of the orders (all vs. open).
Both methods involve order processing and parameter checking with similar control flows.
Both methods handle order operations and may encounter similar exceptions related to order status.
Both methods access and manipulate margin account data, though for different purposes.
Both methods modify the state of the margin account, albeit through different operations (orders vs. transfers).

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the margin account is a prerequisite for order operations.
Environment setup is required before querying or modifying margin account orders.
Verifying the status of orders is crucial for assertions after querying all orders.
